Description: Enforce a canonical policy decision point (`allow`,`challenge`,`deny`,`escalate`) across all paid action paths with deterministic outputs and fail-closed behavior.
Bind policy/request fingerprints to decisions and settlement outputs, then export deterministic `ReceiptBundle.v1` artifacts verifiable offline.
Implement deterministic dispute lifecycle, verdict issuance, and replay-safe release/refund/reversal application.
Deliver operator review workflows for challenged/escalated actions and emergency controls with signed audit trails.
Productionize one rail adapter lane under Trust OS enforcement with deterministic settlement and conformance gates.
Ship profile schema/hashing plus CLI simulation and three starter profiles for core buyer workflows.
Lock release quality with abuse-path regressions, deterministic E2E coverage, and mandatory release workflow gates.
Convert Trust OS v1 completion into adoption via quickstart success, reference blueprints, and measurable activation/pilot funnel instrumentation.
